resources:
Seedkeeper WebviewActivity Welcome Seedkeeper lets you easily generate, import and export a variety of crypto related secrets. Your seedphrases manager Don’t write your seedphrases on a piece of paper anymore! We offer you an advanced hardware solution to store them properly. Using NFC To use it, put the card on top of your phone when prompted and keep it on the reader throughout the operation. Start Seedkeeper No Seedkeeper card yet? \nClick here to buy one. Click\n&\nScan Cancel Ready to Scan Hold your Seedkeeper near your phone Done No scanned card You need to scan a card to display its information Close Please retrieve the secret first Mnemonic is not valid! More info
All Mnemonic Password Descriptors Data
OK Operation successful! Warning Info An error occured, please try again Pin verified! Pin changed successfully! Card scanned successfully! Secret imported successfully! Secret exported successfully! Card label changed successfully! Card logs fetched successfully! Card scanned successfully! Card backed up successfully! Card setup successful! Scanning None Busy Error during card scan Your Seedkeeper needs to be setup! Wrong PIN, tries left: Too many incorrect PIN attempts! Your card has been blocked. Secret successfully deleted. Different card detected, please use right card! Card is ready to reset! Card reset was successful! Reset command sent Factory reset cancelled. Card not initialized! Backup card not initialized! No more memory available on card! Import failed, the secret is too long! Error during card processing
Generate Regenerate Generate a secret Generate a mnemonic phrase Generate a password Generate a bitcoin descriptor Allows you to quickly generate and import a new secret. Allows you to quickly generate a mnemonic phrase. Allows you to quickly generate a password. The following secret has been successfully imported into your Seedkeeper Import Easy to read
Type of secret Mnemonic phrase Login/Password Label Mnemonic size %d words Passphrase Wallet descriptor
Login URL (optional) Length Import Copied to clipboard Please select at least one character set Previously used Write new email Or use existing: Write a new one:
Import Import a mnemonic phrase Allows you to import an existing mnemonic phrase into your Seedkeeper. Import a password Allows you to import an existing password into your Seedkeeper. Import a wallet descriptor Allows you to import an existing wallet descriptor into your Seedkeeper. Import what you want Allows you to import any data into your Seedkeeper Enter your mnemonic here Enter your password here Enter your wallet descriptor here Enter your data here Enter your secret here Click on \'Generate\' to generate a random secret Mnemonic type BIP39 Wallet descriptor Free field
Card Information Make a backup How to use Seedkeeper Terms of service Privacy policy All our \nproducts
Settings Show the introduction screens You have to restart the application Starter intro Debug mode Activate the verbose logs collection Show logs Factory reset Reinitialize your card to its factory state. Warning: this will erase all secrets! Reset my card
Reset You are about to reset your card to factory settings. All data including secrets will be erased! This process is irreversible. Check this box to proceed Send reset command You are currently performing the reset of your card. Click on the reset command to continue... Or cancel to quit. Your card has been factory reset. Steps remaining: Warning: PIN remaining: Factory reset cancelled
Card version Card label PIN code Change PIN code Card authenticity Card authentikey Seedkeeper status this card is genuine this card is not genuine Available memory Total memory Secrets stored Show card logs
Edit card label Allows you to change the label of the card (max 64 characters) Card label changed successfully!
Card authentication failed! Impossible to authenticate the issuer of this card. It was not issued by Satochip S.R.L. If you didn\'t load the card yourself, be extremely careful! Card authenticated successfully! This card was issued by Satochip S.R.L. You can safely use it. Show card certificates Hide card certificates Card certificate Sub-CA certificate Root CA certificate Copy to clipboard
Setup Setup new PIN Change PIN Change your PIN code To modify the card PIN code, first enter the current PIN code. Enter the new PIN code Edit the PIN code to secure access to your Seedkeeper smart card. Enter PIN Enter your PIN code Enter the PIN code for your backup card If the card has not been setup yet, you will be asked to create a new PIN in the next screen.--> Enter PIN (4–16 chars) Create a PIN code for your card Create a PIN code for your backup card Create a PIN code to secure access to your Seedkeeper smart card. Wrong PIN code! The PIN code value does not match! \n please try again Confirm PIN code Confirm the PIN code that you entered previously Next Confirm Restart the setup PIN flow error shouldNotHappen
Backup Pairing Master Card Backup Card Home Back Restart Scan my seedkeeper Make the backup In order to make a backup of your Seedkeeper (master card) to another one, you’ll first need to pair the backup card. Start the backup process and follow the wizard. Please prepare your Seedkeeper backup card and click next to pair the card. Now that your backup card has been paired, please rescan your Seedkeeper card. Perfect! You are now ready to copy the content of this card to your backup card using an encrypted communication. Please prepare your Seedkeeper backup card and click next to copy your backup. Congratulations! secrets saved in backup card You have successfully made a backup of your Seedkeeper card. Warning! There were some issues during backup. Some secrets may not have been backed up.
Manage your crypto-related secrets at your fingertips with Seedkeeper. Search: My secrets list
Add secret Generate and save a new secret or simply import an existing one to your Seedkeeper. Allows you to quickly generate and import a new secret. Import a secret Allows you to import an existing secret into your Seedkeeper.
My secret Manage your secret Secret information and related actions Reveal Click on \'Reveal\' to export secret from card Delete Seed SeedQR Xpub Login URL This option is only available for the latest Seedkeeper card - buy yours at https://satochip.io/product/seedkeeper Buy Seedkeeper Encrypted secret Can\'t export this secret due to specific export policy "You are about to reset a secret. \nThis process is irreversible!" Check this box to proceed
Mnemonic Public key Descriptor 2FA
Logs Number of entries: Please enable debug mode
Card logs

Label field is required! Password field is required! Mnemonic field is required! Descriptor field is required! Data field is required! Card label is too long (max 64 bytes) Label is too long (max 127 bytes)! Password is too long (max 255 bytes)! Mnemonic is too long (max 255 bytes)! Descriptor is too long (max 65535 bytes)! Data is too long (max 65536 bytes)! Login is too long (max 255 bytes)! URL is too long (max 255 bytes)! Passphrase is too long (max 255 bytes)! Mnemonic is in the wrong format! Payload is too long for Seedkeeper v1 (max 255 bytes)! "Please select at least one character set" This secret policy does not allow export in plaintext! PIN should be between 4 and 16 characters! The PIN code value does not match! \nplease try again or cancel
